name: Dangerous Degrees
description:
Caught up in the thrill of dune bashing while camping, you wreck your 4x4 in the middle of the treacherous desert.

As you fight to survive you learn the ways of the desert, scavenge, build shelter, kill for food and protect yourself from the unknown. As you progress you evolve from man to beast. The caves are your home. Civilization becomes long forgotten.  As the desert consumes you, you become its soul.

For both man and animal you are the predator.
